崗.definition: (bound form) hillock; mound; sentry post; policeman's beat; (bound form) job; post

崗仁波齊.definition: Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet; also written 岡仁波齊|冈仁波齐

崗位工資.definition: standard salary for a specific job (contrasted with performance pay 績效工資|绩效工资[ji4 xiao4 gong1 zi1] or commission 提成[ti2 cheng2] etc)

崗子.definition: mound; hillock; welt (on the skin); ridge (on the road surface etc)

崗巴.definition: Gamba county, Tibetan: Gam pa rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

崗巴縣.definition: Gamba county, Tibetan: Gam pa rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
